name: A day with Frog the Jam VN
name_original: A day with Frog the Jam VN
description:
This is my first game and also a visual novel.

this is based on a bunch of yugioh cards.

it was made completely with non-paid images, sounds and music.

this game was made in just a few days so i could learn how to make visual novels.

most images of characters come from https://yugiohrender.blogspot.com/  while most sounds come from https://wingless-seraph.net/en/index.html  while some others come from https://freesound.org/browse/tags/game-sound/ and http://osabisi.sakura.ne.jp/m2/

if you read this, you can tell the game won't be a masterpiece, i did this mostly as practice and also as a joke.
